author: Flo (tonebytone)
content: In your previous post, I commented that I never get tired of looking at your bicycle images. And here's yet another, with again a different personality. I don't know how you do it! Is the air different in Austria, lol? The direction of the light is almost frontal in this image, yet it sparkles in its own way like the previous one, in which the direction of the light is different.
